The following exception was generated while performing Sanity on build 22. It 
is not considered major as it did not affect the results of the Sanity tests 
and performing Sanity a second time could not reproduce the exception.


!SESSION Jan 26, 2004 09:01:29.765 --------------------------------------------
-
java.version=1.4.2_02
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.

!MESSAGE Background Indexer Crash Recovery

Bogdan or sean ?
Redirect to bogdan, he's to quiet nowadays 8-)

Can't reproduce on recent build. (Created managed project and saved -> 
triggering indexing).

BG

This is a duplicate of a bug (53379) that I fixed a long time ago and back-
ported to 1.2 for Tracy Miranda.

This bug has been verified on Eclipse build 20040603 and CDT build 
200406030301, and it passes.

Pixy.
